templates.title: Immich
templates.name: immich
templates.description: Self-hosted backup solution for photos and videos on mobile device.

env.label: Immich version
env.name: IMMICH_VERSION
env.description: To want to lock to a specific tag, provide a value such as 'v1.71.0'

env.label: Database password
env.name: DB_PASSWORD
env.description: This should be changed to a random secret

env.label: Database hostname
env.name: DB_HOSTNAME
env.description: The default value references a service within the stack

env.label: File backup location
env.name: UPLOAD_LOCATION
env.description: You can leave this path as-is, and the system will auto-create the needed folders. Feel free to change if you desire an alternative location.

env.label: Redis hostname
env.name: REDIS_HOSTNAME
env.description: The default value references a service within the stack

templates.title: Watchtower
templates.name: watchtower
templates.description: A container-based solution for automating Docker container base image updates
